thread.title: Earthquake in Nepal: Magnitude 5.0 on temblor on Richter scale strikes region; sparks panic, people rush out of homes

author: FE Online
title: Earthquake in Nepal: Magnitude 5.0 on temblor on Richter scale strikes region; sparks panic, people rush out of homes
text:
World news Earthquake in Nepal: Magnitude 5.0 on temblor on Richter scale strikes region; sparks panic, people rush out of homes Earthquake in Nepal: Magnitude 5.0 on temblor on Richter scale strikes region; sparks panic, people rush out of homes This one too was very strong at 5.0 on the Richter scale although nowhere near the April quake measured at magnitude-7.8. By: FE Online | Published: February 27, 2017 10:28 AM The quake today sparked panic among teh people and they could be seen rushing out of their homes onto the streets. (Picture for representative purpose only. Credit: PTI) 
Earthquake in Nepal: In yet another fearful reminder of the ‘big one’, also known as the ‘Gorkha earthquake’ hit Nepal today. This one too was very strong at 5.0 on the Richter scale although nowhere near the April quake measured at magnitude-7.8. While that one killed some 9,000 people and injured as many as 22,000, there is no news yet of anyone being injured by the temblor today. The quake today sparked panic among teh people and they could be seen rushing out of their homes onto the streets. 
(Further details awaited)
